author: mmusich
body:
#### PR description:

As requested at https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/41120#issuecomment-1479613523, introduce a new plugin  `SiStripNoisesAndBadCompsChecker` tat  given a certain Global Tag, checks that the all the unmasked strips (as per input `SiStripBadStrip` records), do have a noise within the DetId range, to avoid leading to the issue solved in #41120.

#### PR validation:

Private tests, running the configuration file added here.
